001package game;
002
003/**
004 * This class creates all items used in the world of Zuul
005 * @author Christophe TARATIBU (2025/2026)
006 * @version 2025/2026 (09.01.2026)
007 */
008public class Item {
009    /** Description of the item */
010    private final String aItemDescription;
011    /** Weight of the item */
012    private final int aItemWeight;
013
014    /**
015     * Constructor for objects of class Item
016     * @param pItemDescription Description of the item
017     * @param pItemPoids Weight of the item             
018     */
019    public Item(final String pItemDescription, final int pItemPoids){
020        this.aItemDescription = pItemDescription;
021        this.aItemWeight = pItemPoids;
022       
023    }
024    
025    /**
026     * Get the item weight
027     * @return Weight of the item
028     */
029    public int getItemWeight(){
030        return this.aItemWeight;
031    }
032
033    /**
034     * Get the item description
035     * @return Name of the item
036     */
037    public String getItemDescription(){
038        return this.aItemDescription;
039    }
040    
041}
